item.title: Luiz Carlos Cosmi Filho
item.description: About me Hi there, I’m an electrical engineering undergraduate student at UFES. In 2018, I joined some research groups at LabVisio. Some research topics are: Cloud computing Computer vision Digital image processing Robotics I’m more involved in cloud computing projects, studying tools like Kubernetes, Docker, Ansible. Most of the time programming in Python. Recently, I joined ISVision with the proposal to help design a backend system for image processing. About this website I try to log down my learnings about containers, Kubernetes, Docker, programming, etc (and also practice writing in English).
